item.title: [SCRUM-81] 4.EXTRA.1 Verify background change functionality on Reports
pre-conditions: 2. Chrome browser is installed on desktop;
steps: 1. Login with a valid email and password;
4. Change the background to the dark mode;
5. Click on previous arrow from pager navigation between expenses and income;
expected results: 1. Main page is loaded. Reports button is visible.
2. Reports page is loaded. Expenses and income are visible. Only the total expenses incurred in the current month are shown, by each category;

3. A graph is displayed with all expenses in the SPORTS, HOBBIES category. The axes of the graph should be clearly visible. The text on the graph should be legible and not overlap. The sums of all products for that category are displayed in descending order;
4. The background changes in dark mode. The text and UI elements remain legible and clear;
5. Only the total income incurred in the current month are shown, by each category;

6. A graph is displayed with all expenses in the SALARY category. The axes of the graph should be clearly visible. The text on the graph should be legible and not overlap. The sums of all receipts for that category are displayed in descending order. The text and UI elements remain legible and clear;
7. Main page is displayed. The text and UI elements remain legible and clear.
